attributes.action: legistlate for archaeological surveys on all new property developments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our heritage is very important. History is often underground and too often new housing and industrial estates are created without any regard to what may lie buried. No new development should be given approval without a full aerial and ground survey made of the land to be built on and if any archaeological remains are evident, no planning permission should be granted.
